message.entry: Incorrect number of input arguments. Each parameter name must be followed by a corresponding value.

''BinCounts'' parameter is not supported if any of ''NumBins'',''BinWidth'', ''BinMethod'', ''XBinLimits'', or ''YBinLimits'' is specified, and it must be a matrix of size [length(XBinEdges)-1 length(YBinEdges)-1].
Specify ''BinCounts'' when ''BinCountsMode'' value is ''manual''.
Specify ''XBinEdges'' and ''XBinLimits'' when ''XBinLimitsMode'' value is ''manual''.
Specify ''YBinEdges'' and ''YBinLimits'' when ''YBinLimitsMode'' value is ''manual''.
''XBinEdges'' value must be a vector of length at least 2.
''YBinEdges'' value must be a vector of length at least 2.
''FaceColor'' value must be ''flat'' when ''DisplayStyle'' value is ''tile''.
''FaceLighting'' value must be ''none'' when ''DisplayStyle'' value is ''tile''.
''BinMethod'' value ''manual'' is not supported.
{0} input is not a valid color.
''XBinEdges'' parameter must not be followed by any of ''NumBins'',''BinWidth'', ''BinMethod'', or ''XBinLimits''.
''YBinEdges'' parameter must not be followed by any of ''NumBins'',''BinWidth'', ''BinMethod'', or ''YBinLimits''.
The length of ''XBinEdges'' must be one longer than the number of rows of ''BinCounts'' when ''BinCountsMode'' value is ''manual''.
The length of ''YBinEdges'' must be one longer than the number of columns of ''BinCounts'' when ''BinCountsMode'' value is ''manual''.
''BinCounts'' parameter is not supported when data to distribute among bins is not specified.
First two arguments must be numeric or logical and they must have the same size.
''BinCounts'' parameter is not supported when ''BinCountsMode'' value is ''auto''.
''XBinEdges'' and ''XBinLimits'' parameters are not supported when ''XBinLimitsMode'' value is ''auto''.
''YBinEdges'' and ''YBinLimits'' parameters are not supported when ''YBinLimitsMode'' value is ''auto''.
{0} parameter is not supported when ''BinCountsMode'' value is ''manual''.
Transparency of histogram bars and edges is not supported with software OpenGL renderer. Consider setting figure renderer to ''painters''.
{0} function is not supported when ''BinCountsMode'' value is ''manual''.
Value
X bin edges
Y bin edges
